Name: Joseph
SkillDescription[2]: ATK +5

Name: Speer
SkillDescription[2]: ATK +10
SkillDescription[4]: HP +50

Name: Modell
SkillDescription[2]: DMG dealt increases by 3% when attacking enemies within 2m.
SkillDescription[4]: DMG taken reduced by 3% when attacked by enemies within 2m.

Name: Hermann
SkillDescription[2]: DMG dealt increases by 3% when attacking enemies farther than 3m.
SkillDescription[4]: DMG taken reduced by 3% when attacked by enemies farther than 3m.

Name: Archimedes
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: In every 10s, the next Basic Attack increases Basic Attack DMG by 10% for 4s.

Name: Edison
SkillDescription[2]: Signal Orb skill DMG increases by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: After a 3-Ping, DMG dealt increases by 5% for 5s.

Name: Alice
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: Healing a target also increases its Physical DMG and Elemental DMG by 4% for 4s.

Name: Cunningham
SkillDescription[2]: Physical and Elemental DMG increase by 5% when attacking enemies with Super Armor.
SkillDescription[4]: If being attacked multiple times within 5s, gain a shield that reduces the next DMG taken by 30%. 5s cooldown.

Name: Anderia
SkillDescription[2]: When attacking, has a 20% chance to call an artillery strike, each shell dealing 40% Physical DMG to the target. 15s cooldown.

Name: Erwin
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 10%.
SkillDescription[4]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 15% without being attacked. 12s cooldown starts when taking a hit.

Name: Aife
SkillDescription[2]: For each orb pinged, all DMG increases by 2% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 5 times.
SkillDescription[4]: Enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping. 60s cooldown.

Name: Ike
SkillDescription[2]: All DMG increases by 2% and Elemental DMG increases by 4%.
SkillDescription[4]: When dealing Elemental DMG, you have a 15% chance to inflict Burn, Electrocute, Frost, and Corruption depending on the element. Lasts 5 seconds and has an 8 second cooldown on the same unit.

Name: Voltaire
SkillDescription[2]: Attacks reduce the target's DEF by 10% for 5s. 12s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, the Physical DEF of the attacked enemy reduced by 15% for 7s. Can be stacked up to 2 times.

Name: Gloria
SkillDescription[2]: Attacks reduce the target's all Elemental Resistance by 6% for 5s. 12s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, reduces the Elemental Resistance of enemies within 5m by 6% for 7s. Resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Richelieu
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 5%. Next healing effect increases the target's Physical DMG by 8% for 4s. 5s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: Gains 1 random orb for every 8 orbs pinged. 5s cooldown.

Name: Samantha
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 5%. Next healing effect increases the target's Elemental DMG by 8% for 4s. 5s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: The next healing effect adds an elemental aura that increases the Elemental DMG and Elemental Resistance of the allies in the area by 8% and 5% respectively. 10s cooldown.

Name: Mozart
SkillDescription[2]: All DMG increases by 15% when in Matrix.
SkillDescription[4]: Deals 200% damage to all enemies on screen when you enter Matrix.

Name: Liv: Reindeer
SkillDescription[2]: Signal Orb skill DMG and healing effect increase by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: Attacks have a 20% chance to drop Christmas gifts next to the enemy. Picking up a gift restores 5 Energy and increases all DMG dealt by 5% for 5s. 10s cooldown.

Name: New Year Fireworks
SkillDescription[2]: ATK increases by 5%. For every 3 Red Orbs pinged, summons 4 red packets that deal 10% Fire DMG when they touch the enemies. Lasts 10s. 30s cooldown.

Name: Lantern Festival: Reunion
SkillDescription[2]: After performing a 3-Ping or QTE skill, releases a lantern to follow your character, increasing the ATK and Movement Speed of nearby allies by 7% for 15s. 30s cooldown.

Name: Condelina
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 15%
SkillDescription[4]: Basic Attacks have a 25% chance to go berserk, increasing Basic Attack DMG by 15% and CRIT Rate by 5% for 5s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Shakespeare
SkillDescription[2]: All ATK increases by 3% and Fire DMG increases by 7%.
SkillDescription[4]: Attacks have a 50% chance to inflict Burn for 5s. When attacking a burning enemy, there is a 20% chance to cause an explosion, dealing 100% Fire DMG. 5s cooldown. Burn: Reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 8% and deals 12% Fire DMG per second. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

Name: Heisen
SkillDescription[2]: All ATK increases by 3% and Lightning DMG increases by 7%.
SkillDescription[4]: Attacks have a 25% chance to trigger a Thunderstorm with a radius of 3.5 meters. The storm Electrocutes the target for 5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 5 seconds. Attacking an Electrocuted enemy has a 20% chance to deal damage with a lightning chain. Has a cooldown of 8 seconds. Lightning Chain: All electrocuted targets take 250% Lightning DMG. Thunderstorm: Deals 100% of Lightning DMG. Electrocute: Reduces Lightning Resistance by 8%.

Name: Darwin
SkillDescription[2]: For every orb pinged, all DMG increases by 3% for 4s. Can be stacked up to 5 times.
SkillDescription[4]: When an orb is pinged, you will gain a corresponding color of it. Collects 3 colors to unleash a shockwave with 12m radius, dealing 600% Physical DMG.

Name: Hanna
SkillDescription[2]: 3-Ping DMG increases by 25%.
SkillDescription[4]: Enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping and gains a random Signal Orb. 30s cooldown.

Name: Cottie
SkillDescription[2]: Gains 20% more Energy when pinging an orb. Signature Move requires 20% less Energy.
SkillDescription[4]: All DMG increases by 15% for 10s after performing a Signature Move and gains Super Armor that reduces DMG taken by 20% for 5s.

Name: Da Vinci
SkillDescription[2]: When QTE is triggered, the Construct on the field gains 10% ATK and 20% DEF for 8s.
SkillDescription[4]: When QTE is triggered, triggers another Construct's QTE. 8s cooldown. If there are 3 Constructs on the field, ATK is increased by 20%.

Name: Catherine
SkillDescription[2]: QTE and 3-Ping skills reduce the target's Physical DEF by 20% for 8s. 10s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, gains a HP Shield equal to 20% of DEF and increases Physical DMG by 15% for 5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 8 seconds.

Name: Einsteina
SkillDescription[2]: QTE and 3-Ping skills reduce the target's corresponding Elemental Resistance by 15% for 8s. 10s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, releases an elemental aura, gaining Elemental Resistance equal to 5% + 1% of own DEF for 5s. Elemental DMG dealt increases by 15% when the aura is present. 8s cooldown.

Name: Philip II
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 10%. Next healing effect increases the target's Physical DMG by 10% and DEF by 10% for 5s. 8s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: Recharges Drone when healing. After fully charged, next healing will use up all energy and summon an Elemental Drone. The Healing Drone will automatically follow the teammate with the lowest HP. Within a circle of 5 meters, the Drone continues to heal teammates for 2% of their maximum HP per second and increases their Physical DMG by 15% for 5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 12 seconds.

Name: Guinevere
SkillDescription[2]: Heals for 10% more. Increases the Elemental DMG and Resistances of the healing target by 10% for 5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 8 seconds.
SkillDescription[4]: Recharges Drone when healing. After fully charged, next healing will use up all energy and summon an Elemental Drone. The Healing Drone will automatically follow the teammate with the lowest HP. Within a circle of 5 meters, the Drone continues to heal teammates for 2% of their maximum HP per second and increases their Elemental ATK by 15% for 5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 12 seconds.

Name: Frederick
SkillDescription[2]: Each dodge increases Movement Speed by 15% and all DMG dealt by 5% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 3 times.
SkillDescription[4]: The next dodge reduces the attacker's speed by 20% and increases its damage taken by 15% for 4s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Bathlon
SkillDescription[2]: All ATK increases by 3% and Dark DMG increases by 7%
SkillDescription[4]: Dealing DMG has a 20% chance to summon a Dark Zone that lasts 5s. 5s cooldown. The Dark Zone will inflict Corruption for 3s. Attacking a Corrupted target has a 20% chance to gain 1 random Signal Orb. 12s cooldown. Corruption: Deals 80% Dark DMG for every 2s and reduces Dark Resistance by 8%.

Name: Patton
SkillDescription[2]: CRIT Rate and Physical DMG increase by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: Each time you deal Physical DMG, if it is not a CRIT Hit, the CRIT Rate of the next Physical DMG increases by 2%, stacking up to a maximum of 20%. This effect is reset when you deal a CRIT Hit. CRIT Hit increases Physical DMG by 5% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

SkillDescription[4]: Lose 5% of maximum HP every 5s.

SkillDescription[4]: Lose 5% of maximum HP every 5s.
